TEXT.S:
Korea iga-miladay tu dietu,2017 Korea iga "(Along with the Gods)"
sapuelac nu Hulam aut Amilika: (Hulam):;:Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds2017 7 (Amilika)Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds (Hangul: - ; RR: Sin gwa Hamkke - Joe wa Beol; lit. "God with Together - Sin and Punishment") is a 2017 South Korean fantasy drama film directed by Kim Yong-hwa and based on a webcomic by Joo Ho-min. The film will be released in two parts, and stars Ha Jung-woo, Cha Tae-hyun, Ju Ji-hoon and Kim Hyang-gi. The first part of the film was released on December 20, 2017.
belih nu Sakizay: namatahkal i 2007 a mihcan a iga nu Korea, kya kungku namisulit ni ZhouHao. ci Jin Cehong, amipauzip cacay wawana ciniza, uyzasa mapatay i lamal. sisa, tayza tu ciniza i la'cusay a kitakit.
siwkay nu iga: u baeketay nu uzip sa, caay kaw tanaya' ku uzip nu misu, u cucuknu balucu' i zazan nu uzip nu misu, uyzaan maala atu masubelidayi balucu' nu misu. (Hulam) (Amilika)What matters the most in life is never how long you can live, but how much love you receive and leave behind. uniyan a sizumaay a iga sa, namakay misumad nay banga nu Korea "miladay tu dietu"(Along with the Gods: The Two Worlds) u kungku musakamu, izaw ku cacay matalulay a papanengayayci Jincehung, amipauzip tu tademaw sa, mapatay i kawaw niza. namapatay ciniza sa, tayzatu ciniza i duutay a kitakit. tayni militemuh ku tulu caculculen. cacacacay a mapatayay a tademaw, ilaed 49 a demiad, amicaliw pitu a liclic. anu malakuid ku liclic, taneng ciniza tatikuu uzipay a kitakit, anusa caay malakuid ku liclic, atayza ciniza i la'cusay a kitakit.
49
